titleStmt.title: Christ's ministers must shortly put off their tabernacles set forth in a funeral sermon preach'd at Hungerford at the interring of Mr. Ric. Moor, late minister of the Gospel there / by Samuel Tomlyns ...
titleStmt.author: Tomlyns, Samuel, 1632 or 3-1700.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained and torn, with print showthrough and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
